attributes.action: Put all government job adverts on Government websites rather than paying newspapers to do exactly the same thing.
attributes.additional_details:
Why is the Uk government paying space in expensive broadsheet papers when it already has a Civil Service job website AND a job seekers web site. Local jobs would be down tolocal councils.
 If a Civil servent has not the simple iniatitive to look on the internet to find a job they are not capable of working in the UK government.
